name: Grandma's No-Bake Cheesecake
author: Jennifer Horrace
summary: This is a quick and easy cheesecake recipe created by my grandmother and handed down through 3 generations. Each has put their own special touch on it but the overall taste is the same. Blue Ribbon flavor for years of happy memories!
ingredients: 1 (8 ounce) container whipped topping (such as Cool Whip®)
1 (8 ounce) package cream cheese, cut into 6 pieces
directions: Mix whipped topping, sour cream, sugar, and vanilla extract together in a large bowl until blended
Place cream cheese pieces on a microwave-safe plate
Microwave at 30-second intervals until warm and soft, but not discolored, about 1 minute
Mix cream cheese into whipped topping mixture; beat with an electric bender on medium speed until light and fluffy, about 2 minutes
Pour into graham cracker crust, smoothing the top
Refrigerate cheesecake until set, 4 to 5 hours
